official_title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act and the Railway Labor Act so as to provide for the certification of representatives only upon vote by secret ballot of 50 percent of employees entitled to vote in the election, and to require that employees voting in such elections be afforded an opportunity to vote against representation by any individual or organization.

summary.text: Provides, under the National Labor Relations Act and the Railway Labor Act, for the certification of labor representatives only upon vote by secret ballot of 50 percent of the employees entitled to vote in the union election. Requires that employees voting in such elections be afforded an opportunity to vote against representation by any individual or organization.
